Name: Mage Mountain
About the game: - Roguelike Deckbuilder - Collect cards and Level-up your 7 Skills - Synergize your Skills with the cards you have to maximize their effectiveness - E.g: the card 'attack MELEE x3' will deal 15 damage if you have 5 MELEE , but only 6 damage if you have 2 MELEE . - A unique, flexible deckbuilding system - Skills based levelling up which affects the power of your cards - Turn-based card battles - Ability to unlock new cards - 3 Stages - 80+ unique cards - 25+ enemies - Merchants, churches, taverns, witches
